info.name: thread figure 2 (221/183 chars)
info.description:
trigo variant of [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/wltGzS[/url]

Could it be shorter ? (with identical look).

renderpass.code:
// trigo variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/wltGzS
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
// ( without color: -38 chars -> 185 )

#define mi                                                     \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                                  \
          b = cos( iTime + 11.*O.xw ),                         \
          p = ( u+u - R ) / R.y + b*O.wx;                      \
    O = .99* texture( iChannel0, (u+O.wx) / R )                \
        +  max(0., 1. - R.y/3.                                 \
                      * length(p - b * clamp( dot(p, b) / dot(b, b), 0., 1.)) ) \
        * ( .6 + .6 * cos( 6.*iTime  + vec4(0,23,21,0)  ) );
renderpass.name: Common
